Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Mike Krukow (NYG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1985, off Mark Davis (NYG)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Injured on 3/19/1986 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...

Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Kansas City on 4/14/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1987, hitting .469 with 0 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 4/15/1988...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Kansas City on 5/8/1988...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 6/23/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1988, hitting .600 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/1988, hitting .552 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/3/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $17,777,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1990, hitting .632 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won World Series with Chicago in 1992...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/4/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $16,665,938 per year...
Traded from Chicago to Pittsburgh on 4/3/1993 (Going to PIT: 3B Wade Boggs. Going to CHC: C Doug Mirabelli)...
